attributes.action: Take into account CSA  take tax,insurance and pension, as a net income not gross
attributes.additional_details: Me like many other parent would like the csa to take into account that parent pay tax, insurance and pensions before they make there decision on child support. I love to provide for my kids but what there review is asking what I should be paying is going to cause me hardship. I have deductions from my salary I can avoid.
attributes.background: I’d like a change for csa to make there annual review after tax, insurance and pension before making their decision
